Description_lang: $?a137033[You have a chance to refund $s1% of the Insanity drained by 1 second of Voidform][Your spells and abilities have]$?a137019[ a chance to refund $s1% of a charge of Fire Blast]?a137020[ a chance to generate an Icicle][]$?!(a137033|a137019|a137020)[ a chance to refund $s1% of the $@spelldesc298373 spent on them][]$?a298339[, heal you for ${$s3*(1+$@versadmg)}, and increase your Versatility by $298339s1 for $298343d][ and heal you for ${$s3*(1+($298337s1/100))*(1+$@versadmg)}].

description_blz.en_US: Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Mana spent on them and heal you for 89.
description_blz.es_MX: Tus hechizos y habilidades tienen una probabilidad de restituirte un 50% de los Maná gastados en ellos y sanarte 89.
description_blz.pt_BR: Seus feitiços e habilidades têm chance de restaurar 50% do custo de Mana e restaurar 89 pontos de vida.
description_blz.de_DE: Eure Zauber und Fähigkeiten haben eine Chance, Mana in Höhe von 50% der verbrauchten Menge zu erstatten und Euch um 89 Gesundheit zu heilen.
description_blz.en_GB: Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Mana spent on them and heal you for 89.
description_blz.es_ES: Tus hechizos y facultades tienen una probabilidad de devolver un 50% de la cantidad de Maná que hayas gastado en ellos y sanarte 89 p.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vos sorts et techniques ont une chance de vous restituer 50% de la ressource (Mana) dépenséea298339 vous rendent 59 points de vie, et augmentent votre Polyvalence de 12 pendant 8 s][ et vous récupérez 89 points de vie].
description_blz.it_IT: Gli incantesimi e le abilità hanno una probabilità di ripristinare il 50% della risorsa Mana consumata e di curarti di 89.
description_blz.ru_RU: Ваши заклинания и способности могут восполнить 50% потраченного ресурса (мана) и восполнить вам 89 ед. здоровья.
description_blz.ko_KR: 주문 및 능력 사용 시 일정 확률로 시전에 사용된 마나의 50%를 돌려받고 생명력을 89만큼 회복합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的法術和技能有一定機率恢復法力耗費的50%，並為你治療89點生命力。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的法术和技能有几率返还其消耗的法力值的50%，并为你恢复89点生命值。
